issue.title: medium.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://medium.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmedium.com) ### Comment > Hello, my medium profile won't open with adguard activated. However, with writing story and clicking profile worked. (If you need gif file, please let me know.) > > Medium team saids it may caused by extensions or ad-blockers, and after turning off AdGuard it worked as usual. > > I think one of recent update (from Medium or AdGuard I don't know exactly) affected to it. > > Thanks Username: `@jhk0530` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/fgpaio54tbswkwsogswgkscgo4cosc0lf7r204kyf4.png?nc=1)

issue.title: com.suno.android

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.8

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.suno.android

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

performed_via_github_app.name: GitHub Actions
performed_via_github_app.description: Automate your workflow from idea to production

issue.title: m.economictimes.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://open.spotify.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopen.spotify.com%2F) ### Comment > Any time an advertisement comes on while listening on Spotify, the Ablocker does its job and blocks the ad. However, this only stops it from ever playing, ultimately stopping the music from playing entirely. I can't skip the blocked ad, because, well, it's an ad, but it won't play cause of the ad blocker. I understand I could turn it off when listening to Spotify, but I'd hope there would be an easier fix. The only fix other than that that I've found it restarting the whole spotofy webpage and starting my music again. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/iby0yh9y92ossk0848c0cw004cc8g8kdvokwki32ag.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/hmyc2q9xkc8w044404so8os88s4g8wkjuassxdwb5s.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
AdGuard for mobile devices (Android, iOS) use optimized filter lists (some old not used rules [basing on statistics] are automatically removed) and that's might be a difference.
What version of AdGuard Dutch filter do you have on Android?
On my device it's:
```
Version: 2.0.7.52
Updated: 10 Dec 2024, 10:31
Rules: 1686
```
